thread.section_title: Amba Hotel Charing Cross - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Holiday inc Faulty towers dining experience
thread.title_full: Holiday inc Faulty towers dining experience - Review of Amba Hotel Charing Cross, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Silversurferpb
title: Holiday inc Faulty towers dining experience
text:
This was Christmas present from our children. What a lovely few days.
The hotel is first class. All the staff were warm and welcoming.
Their reception responded immediately to any problems we encountered which were few. Food quality was excellent. Location next to Charing Cross station was brilliant for getting around and theatre land.
The hotel hosts an hilarious 'Faulty tower dining experience' which is not to be missed!
